text: Lionel Bony de Castellane (28 September 1891 - 29 November 1965) was a French fencer. He won a silver medal in the team foil event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1965 deaths Category:French male fencers Category:French foil fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Gironde Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Lionel Bony de Castellane
